name: Lollipops Blaster
description:
Lollipops Blaster is a very addictive Zuma style game. You match 3 or more same colour lollipops. Eliminate as many groups as possible until one ball reaches the end. Gear up for this entertaining and casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
Fun of shooting.
Very cute and clean HD graphics.
High quality sound effects.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.

Enjoy!
